pack.name: Terra Swoop Force RP
txt.sub.sc1.ln2: <§bSasha§r> We were expecting you almost half an hour ago, but being a tad late is far better than being melted to death and never showing up.
txt.sub.sc1.ln5: <§bSasha§r> Okay, we are already running late, so you should probably §ahead upstairs to begin Alan's briefing on the mission.
